name: OfflineAudioContext.OfflineAudioContext
description: The OfflineAudioContext() constructor—part of the Web Audio API—creates and returns a new OfflineAudioContext object instance, which can then be used to render audio to an AudioBuffer rather than to an audio output device.

refs.name: Web Audio API
refs.description: The definition of 'OfflineAudioContext()' in Web Audio API.
